name: MINImax Tinyverse
detailed_description:
1st Update January 29th!

Check our coming new features in this FIRST Update


  • Changes in our Realm lock system.

  • Matching system improved

  • Changes in Sudden Death

  • 2 New Miracles to the game

  • Daily Game quest to be added

  • Korean Language supported

  • Game Balance

  • Additional UI/UX Improvements

Read the detailed information and coming patch notes in our official News:

https://steamcommunity.com/app/914700/allnews/


About the Game


MINImax Tinyverse, the real-time tower-rush brawler.
Watch and assist your favorite champions as they battle for the realms of Tinyverse.

ABOUT TINYVERSE


Watch and help your realm to achieve the final victory.
In MINImax Tinyverse you take part in 1v1 battles between armies of tiny little beings.
Each army is led by a powerful champion with unique skills and attributes,
and supported by a wide range of troopers who fight alongside you and your Champion.

BATTLE FOR THE TINYVERSE FATE


Aillai and Creaea, two Realms constantly in war for the supremacy of their tiny universe,
are waiting for you to help them achieve the victory.


Since you are almost like a deity to the inhabitants of the Tinyverse, you do not have full control over them, but you can always support them through powerful Miracles.


You can build your decks selecting different combinations of Troopers and Miracles,
and by recruiting a powerful Champion to support your strategy.


MINImax Tinyverse is currently F2P. You can obtain all the champions, troopers and miracles just by playing the game. There will be eventually cosmetics items available for purchase.


  • Enjoy the thrill of 1v1 fast-paced strategical brawler.
  • Play with charming characters, such as: Ortto, Aidel, Tuppi, Shainen on the Aillai side; Murrakah, Kaya, Nia, Fainuke on the Creaea side.
  • Pick up and drop your Champions to protect them from danger or to unleash their skills over the enemies.
  • Tank, damage, heal, siege, scout, hide, snipe, assassinate, blast, slice, pierce and more,
    with 11 different troopers you can select and combine to create the best deck settings!
  • Block, bind, gather, freeze, burn, pollute, heal, purify, slow down, speed up, scare away, super punch and much more, 24 mighty miracles of MINImax Tinyverse to grant victory
    to your realm.
  • Attempt to destroy the defending towers, but beware, they are not going to fall easily!
  • Learn the unlimited possibilities, cool upcoming new features currently in development that we are preparing to unleash on MINImax Tinyverse.

short_description: Real-time, Tower-Rush 'Be a GOD' Strategy Brawler! Watch and assist your favorite champions as they battle for their realms of tinyverse. Outwit opponents by using your miracles with tiny mighty champs and minion troopers! Tiny Realms Await!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvdia GeForce GT 7600
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 750 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
